mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, tb1.* FROM (SELECT b.*, (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM emp e WHERE b.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO) emp_name, (select count(*) from attachment where board_no = b.no) attach_count, (select count(*) from board_comment where board_no = b.no) comment_count FROM board b WHERE b.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY reg_date DESC ) tb1 WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE delete_yn = 'N'

select tb.NO, tb.title, tb.category, tb.reg_date, tb.commentCount from (SELECT b.*, (SELECT count(*) FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE NO = b.NO) commentCount from board b WHERE b.category != '공지' AND b.delete_yn = 'N' order by reg_date desc ) tb where rownum <= 5
select * from (select no, title , reg_date, category, like_count from board where category != '공지' AND reg_date >= (CURRENT_DATE-700) ORDER BY like_count desc) where rownum <= 5
mapper.update: update board set read_count = read_count + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT bc.*, (SELECT emp_name FROM emp e WHERE bc.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO) emp_name, (SELECT dept_name FROM DEPARTMENT d JOIN emp e ON d.DEPT_CODE = e.DEPT_CODE WHERE e.EMP_NO = bc.EMP_NO) dept_name FROM BOARD_COMMENT bc WHERE BOARD_NO = #{no} START WITH comment_level = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR NO = comment_ref ORDER siblings by NO

SELECT b.*, e.EMP_NAME, (SELECT dept_name FROM DEPARTMENT d WHERE d.DEPT_CODE = e.DEPT_CODE) dept_name, (SELECT count(*) FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE board_no = #{no}) comment_count FROM BOARD b JOIN emp e ON b.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO WHERE b.NO = #{no}
